alert.note: Alert for Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued June 01 at 4:28AM MDT until June 01 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Wet snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...The Southern Front Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Snow or slush covered roads will make travel hazardous at times in the higher foothills areas including Interstate 70 west of Evergreen. Bridges and overpasses may also become icy.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be prepared for variable conditions and check the latest road conditions by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet
